Reviews.Title: OMG!!
Reviews.Author: JustMe
Reviews.Content: My out of the box experience was as good as advertised in the BEST of reviews about this item.  The stand was easy to affix.  The tuner worked flawlessly on the first try.  The picture quality was everything that was advertised.  The sound is adequate and there many ways to upgrade.  I haven't tried any of the advanced features but for the price that I paid....I am ever so pleased!  The seller packaged this item remarkably well and it was delivered when promised!

Reviews.Title: Did Not Include 12 Volt DC Power Adapter in Box!
Reviews.Author: Rusty "HeyVee"
Reviews.Content: This Supersonic 24 inch TV is the second "off brand" hi-def 12 volt television I've purchased.  Like other reviewers, this flat panel TV replaces a "tube" type in an RV travel trailer.  The sound, as noted by others, is very crappy and met that expectation 100%.  I also replaced the trailer's stereo with one designed for automobiles.  It has an AUX input which I connected to the Headphone output on the TV.  The picture quality is great and having a built in DVD player minimizes complexities.  The car stereo receiver produces great sound.I almost never write negative reviews; I prefer to either return the item or shop elsewhere next time.  In this instance, I feel compelled to share the downside of this transaction.  I mentioned to the Amazon folks that I'd prefer not having to write this review and that it would be reasonable for the Supersonic distributor to make good on the 12 volt functionality promised in the ad.The Supersonic TV is advertised as being a 12 volt unit, and so it is.  However, they DID NOT include a 12 volt DC connector cable;  included was an adapter that stepped household 110 AC down to 12 DC.  So, if you have shore power on your RV, you simply use the 110 plug already on the television.  If you're without a 110 AC power, you cannot use the 12 volt adapter.  This makes no sense at all.  Both connections require 110 AC.  You cannot use the typical 12 volt "cigarette lighter" plug to power the TV.  You have to buy one somewhere else.  No problem, I thought, I'll search Amazon and other sites.If you try search terms like "12 volt replacement connector" or similar terms, you'll not find the correct piece.  I contacted Amazon, and the fellow I spoke with also couldn't locate the correct connector.  Several times during our conversation, I suggested that it would be worth calling the supplier to find the proper piece.  For whatever reason, even though he seemed to have the best intentions, he diplomatically avoided that option.  A few hours later, he Emailed a link to the correct item for Supersonic TVs.  With shipping, it came to over $25.You wouldn't be a viable business if you tried selling a car without tires; a blender without a blade; a coffee brewer with a carafe; or any product missing a component needed to meet a functional requirement promised to the customer.  This 12 volt connector represents a 10% premium over the advertised price.  It would have changed my purchase decision had they revealed the absence of a proper connector.  Whats really irrational is that the 110 to 12 volt adapter in the box likely cost way more than the simple "cigarette lighter" style plug I needed.  I was also disappointed by Amazon's inability to contact the supplier, as one would do on E Bay, to make it right.Overall, the TV is acceptable as is, but, if you're price conscious, factor in extra expenses simple to operate it on 12 volt DC power.

Reviews.Title: Works Great would purchase again
Reviews.Author: h20houston
Reviews.Content: We purchased the TV to use in our RV. We went out this past weekend and the TV was very easy to setup and use. the menu was very functional. It took us a while to figure out how to eject a DVD after we watched "Where the Red Fern Grows".The TV has a crystal clear picture and the color was fantastic. I thought the sound was very good after I found I could adjust both the treble and the base. I would definately reccomend this TV to my friends ofr home or in their RV.

Reviews.Title: Nice quality
Reviews.Author: Mike
Reviews.Content: Very quick to set up and take apart.  I bought this for my RV.  Just remove the screw from the base, snap the base on and rotate and put the screw back in.  Plug in the power and hook it up and away you go.  The initial screen has you select your input (over the air) or cable, etc.  You just pick and it learns the channels and you are ready to go.  I haven't used the DVD yet.  Since I haven't wall mounted it, I kept all the packing to safely pack it back up and put it under the bench seat in the RV for travel.  Easy as pie.  Just don't bother tightening the screw beyond hand tight if you plan to pack and unpack it regularly.  Great picture and great sound and it runs on 12V so it is an option even when boon docking.

Reviews.Title: Supersonic SC-2412
Reviews.Author: Twotoesfred
Reviews.Content: Bought it for an RV on 6-8-12. Thought the 12 volt would allow us to use it without running the generator. It worked fine until it didn't (about 9 months). Called Supersonic and was told it was out of warranty. Warranty is 90 days. They must be real proud of it. Took it to a local TV repair shop and was told it was the main board, which is only available from Supersonic. They said it would cost more to repair than it was worth. Called Supersonic and asked if they would send the main board to the repair shop and I would pay them to install it. Was told no, Supersonic would have to do the repair. They offered to repair it foe $45 if I sent it to them. I figured a new box (I had recycled the original) plus shipping both ways I would have another $100+ in it and no assurance it would last more than 90 days again. The only way I am aware of to find the length of the warranty is to try to get it repaired. I assumed it would be 1 year as almost all others are. Buyer beware.

Reviews.Title: Great for your RV
Reviews.Author: Kevin Hill
Reviews.Content: Removed the CRT tv and installed this above the windshield on my Class A motorhome and wired it for 12 volt.. I like that I no longer have to start up the generator to get 110 volt to watch tv.. Pull into a rest area, put up the antenna and watch the local channels without bothering your neighbors with a noisy generator.. Also can watch DVD movies..

Reviews.Title: Best Bang for your Buck
Reviews.Author: J. Nelson
Reviews.Content: The picture is really good.  Overall quality is very Good.  Sound could use an upgrade, but this in one good deal for the price.  The power draw is very little.  I used this TV/DVD with my RV battery and was able to watch several movies just fine without having to charge the battery.  I hooked it up to the stereo and got a lot better sound that the TV could provide.  I would definitely recommend this and feel like it was a very good purchase for me and my family.

Reviews.Title: Mostly good so far
Reviews.Author: Jack Stevens
Reviews.Content: I had read that the sound was bad, but oh my! It is difficult to believe how a HDTV can have such poor sound. My old black and whites from the day had better sound!I gave it an OK, because if you go to the expense of an external sound system it is a nice TV.

Reviews.Title: Overall good product for the price
Reviews.Author: ideagirl
Reviews.Content: I bought this to install on a ceiling mounted flip bracket in my motorhome. I wanted a good 12 volt tv I could watch when boondocking.The good:Solidly built, good color with lots of extra ports for gaming or use as a monitor. Excellent digital tuner picks up stations I didn't even get before.12 volt adapter included, runs great directly on my house batteriesAt 48 watts this is a good, energy efficient tv for DC powered systems.Built in DVD player with USB and SD card reader is a nice bonus.The mediocre:Picture is hard to see unless you are looking at it straight on, however the mount I used makes it easy to adjust for best viewing.Horrible speakers, but not any worse than the speakers on any tv of this size. I am running the sound into my dash mount stereo auxiliary input, so the speakers aren't really an issue for me.The bad:Nothing yetAll things considered this is a good purchase for the price and my application.

Reviews.Title: Good quality and value.
Reviews.Author: Colin Johnson
Reviews.Content: This unit will be used in my RV. It comes with a 12V plug in and a 110V adapter. It has a great picture and vibrant color. It also gets in quite a few digital channels with the RV antenna. Setup is very easy. The only bad thing so far is that the sound goes from 0 to 100 which is ridiculous because it does not have much volume. It needs to go to 200 or so at this rate. I can crank it to 80 with my wife sleeping right beside me in our small RV bedroom and not wake her up. But all in all a good 12V TV with a built in DVD player.

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: Dawn M Reyell
Reviews.Content: This is a good TV/DVD player.  Not the highest quality but the price was very good.  It's fine for a bedroom TV and that's all we needed.

Reviews.Title: Great picture
Reviews.Author: misspatt
Reviews.Content: Great picture. Even when using an "over the air" antennae.Sound quality is poor. The unit can not be program w/DirecTV remote. The included remote has limited range.

Reviews.Title: Great TV/DVD Combo
Reviews.Author: Cowboy Camper
Reviews.Content: We purchased this TV/DVD, primarily to install in our motorhome.  So, it was important to have a 12volt unit that could be activated without running the generator.  This was the perfect unit.  It was the right size, great features and the 12volt system is perfect.  I may purchase another unit to replace the other TV.  Thanks, Cowboy Camper

Reviews.Title: Works Like a Charm
Reviews.Author: Video Guy
Reviews.Content: Great connectivity, has all the inputs you need. Good picture, works well with 12v plug, and included AC adapter. Channel scan is fast and accurate. Picture viewing angle is great from side-to-side, but darkens when viewing from a low angle.

Reviews.Title: Great picture, terrible sound
Reviews.Author: Panda Taglioni "Panda Taglioni"
Reviews.Content: I bought this to go in a motorhome, but first hooked it up at home using Comcast, crummy picture and sound, blamed it on a brand I'd never heard of, but when I hooked it up in my RV using rooftop OTA antenna picture quality was really great, better than my 42" Sanyo LCD on same connection, BUT, the sound is still really terrible, speakers buzz, rattle and distort at anything above 1/3rd volume level, TV screen is designed to be viewed directly at eye level or from above, if you mount it too high on a wall and are viewing from below the picture gets very dark, had to get a mount that would pivot down to get the picture back so we could watch sitting on the sofa, has some connections on the side, but most are facing down on the back so you have to turn it upside down to get to them, but it doesn't weigh much. I'm generally pleased with it for the price and might even buy another one for the bedroom.

Reviews.Title: LED 24 Inch
Reviews.Author: JDS
Reviews.Content: Has a really good picture and the DVD works great.  The pacakging was very good and all necessary information and accessories were included.

Reviews.Title: No 12 volt use
Reviews.Author: walter fischer "fishman"
Reviews.Content: This is one of those products that ask "why". You have to have a 115 volt plug no matter what as they give you a 115 volt reducer to 12 volts. it will not work with a cigarette lighter of any other12 volt line . You have to use their reducer to get the 12 volts so for me it was a waste. thy axess tv's

Reviews.Title: The base doesn't fit.
Reviews.Author: Cobra Chick "Miss Tea"
Reviews.Content: The TV is decent enough for an inexpensive model. The sound is tinny, which I expect with this type of unit.The main problem with this item is that the base does not fit the TV. The TV "flops" backwards and pitches forwards on the base, and there is no way to tighten it. It is correctly installed and I pushed it as far into the TV as I felt prudent without damaging the TV.I wrote the manufacturer and sent pictures of what the TV looks like on the base. While they promptly answered me and gave me different instructions for the base (which do not show the base that came with this TV), they refused to acknowledge my request for a new base that fits properly.Bottom line, I do not recommend. I would have returned it, but I have a 7 year old on school vacation, and don't want his gaming equipment taking over my main TV.

Reviews.Title: Worse POS I have ever had - STAY AWAY!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Gloria
Reviews.Content: I can not tell you how much you need not buy this product. 4 months after purchase it is dimming to almost UN-viewable. The picture is dim, and flat looking... almost makes everyone sort of look like the way the Simpson's are drawn... Horrible, horrible, horrible - Stay away.

Reviews.Title: Works great in our RV
Reviews.Author: Brenda Short "BRShort"
Reviews.Content: Bought this for our toy hauler.  We usually dry-camp with no hookups so rely on 12volt.  This TV/DVD combo worked great and didn't use much power.  Sound quality not the greatest, but we hooked it up through our trailer stereo system so sounds just fine.  Very pleased!

Reviews.Title: What a GREAT 12 volt TV!
Reviews.Author: Larry Ayo
Reviews.Content: Outstanding TV ,  everything perfect , order, shipping , and out of the box. I purchased to use in mt motor home just a great TV!

Reviews.Title: Worth the money
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: We bought this for our camper - watched two movies and still had battery left (we have 2 batteries).  Antennae works great, picture is great.  Sound could be better, but it has adjustments.  Very happy with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: Great for trailer!
Reviews.Author: Gunnar's Mom
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my camp trailer.  It's a great size, runs on 12volt or 110. Very nice picture, and good sound, but then I wasn't expecting high quality stereo sound from it, just normal good sound.  My grand kids and I watched several movies on it and it was just what we needed!

Reviews.Title: Great picture quality and design for the bucks
Reviews.Author: Consumer
Reviews.Content: I purchased this TV for my RV because I needed one that would run from a 12 volt or 110 volt and with a dvd it fit my needs perfectly.  The picture quality is ultra sharp and Great quality HDMI.  The set up is easy and I run this through my power antenna on the roof (air) and get lots of local channels.The sound is just ok but could be better.  This is very light weight so it is not a problem mounting it on a adjustable arm mount.All in all a very reasonable purchase.

Reviews.Title: Great tv for rv
Reviews.Author: Linda
Reviews.Content: Like everything except sound. It is a little tinny sounding. The color is good, and the picture sharp. Recommmend it.

Reviews.Title: Need to purchase sound bar
Reviews.Author: KTB
Reviews.Content: Great picture, poor sound.  I read the reviews and decided to give it a try for the price.  Nay sayers were right.  Very poor sound.  Can't understand why Supersonic can make a product with such a good picture and such poor sound.  My husband bought this to go in the sleeper of an 18 wheeler and he couldn't hear the sound until we bought a sound bar for about $20.00 - so I guess all-in-all it worked out ok.

Reviews.Title: works great in my RV, but...
Reviews.Author: J. Penny
Reviews.Content: Overall, I like this TV.  The picture is great, but the sound is "tinny".  There are not very many choices out there for 12 volt TV's, so I felt lucky to find this affordable television for my motor home, despite it's poor sound quality.

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: Ponomarev Vladimir
Reviews.Content: I like it very much. I will recommend it to my friends. It is As I wanted and arrived in time.

Reviews.Title: 12VDC TV
Reviews.Author: Kenneth Motill
Reviews.Content: This TV has met all my expectations. The picture is clear and neat. The fact that it can operate on 12VDC is a big plus.

Reviews.Title: perfect size
Reviews.Author: jj
Reviews.Content: Was uncertian when purchase because of not knowing the brand. Picture is nice and clear and the convient of the DVD player is great. Just not liking the power cord to it. Overall I really like and glad I purchased itand would recommend it to other people

Reviews.Title: super supersonic
Reviews.Author: Allen L. Stears
Reviews.Content: I read the other reviews and since I hadn't much luck with the naxa brand,I thought I would trythe supersonic brand. It arrived very fast, even though I was a long way from the shipping point.I was very pleased with all the features it came with. It has a great picture and is easy to use.Also has a very friendly remote control. I mounted it in my rv using a wall mount bracket.  Great unit.

Reviews.Title: one bad seller..
Reviews.Author: Marc
Reviews.Content: Tried the TV out at home using the 110 volt household power plug and all was well. Went camping and the TV will not start up using 12 volt power unless I start the generator or truck (tried both places); then shut off the truck or RV generator; and the TV will continue to run on 12 volt power.Attempting to turn on the TV when it is plugged into a 12 volt power outlet (without an additional power source), the TV screen just blinks on and off and the TV cannot be used. The manufactures tech support tells me this is normal. If not for the start up problem I would have given the TV 4 stars.----------Update- after the seller forced me to pay return shipping, Amazon took care of this! all charges refunded. ordered the exact same TV (through Amazon)from another source and it has preformed flawlessly in our RV for 2 years now. Not a super crisp display but pleasant, and I wish the volume would go higher. A good travel TV that is easy to transport and has held up.

Reviews.Title: DVD doa - support of no help.
Reviews.Author: Larry Eckdahl
Reviews.Content: DVD did not work - in the process of trying to return it.Supposedly 30 day tech support was useless - much too difficult to access and get any help, though we were on vacation at the time and unable to sit by the phone and wait for a call.When I called Amazon support, they were nice and fairly quick to answer, but were only capable of processing a return.  Web access to support did not work.UPDATE:  Feeling a little ridiculous.  Took the unit back in the house to see if using AC power would help.  Turns out that the input source for DVD must be selected before the DVD would work.  This is different from most DVD's where putting a disc in will start the DVD.So far, picture is good;  sound tinny;  antenna pickup in not as good as others, but all-in-all, appears to be a good value and the plus is 12v. power.

Reviews.Title: Great for the camper.  Low battery drain.
Reviews.Author: Mark fuller
Reviews.Content: When I turned it on there was one LED that wasn't working, but it soon came on after using the TV for couple days.

Reviews.Title: I love it.
Reviews.Author: Grandpa  bear  Willie ; )
Reviews.Content: 12 volt excellent, me and my grandkids cubs love it, now I can drive calmly while they see sponge bob.Grate TV you can buy with confidence and will recommend to others. From Grandpa Bear ;)PS. It gave an extra touch to the RV. Happy camping:)

Reviews.Title: Not Happy
Reviews.Author: JAW
Reviews.Content: Just got the Tv... Husband opened box, took  TV out  of the foam...  OMG  all kinds of loose components sliding from side to side inside the TV. Can not even see the inside of the DVD player.  MIght of happened is assembly or came loose during shipping.  No shock watch on box, No fragile stickers on box,  or keep upright stickers used on box. Contacted Amazon no reply as of yet.  I will keep everyone posted.  We are so bummer because we are leaving for a vacation and needed this TV for our road trip in the travel trailer.

Reviews.Title: Was all set to buy one this weekend when........
Reviews.Author: Chazman
Reviews.Content: BANG! The price went up $16.00 overnight!  What's up with that??? If it comes back down to $199. I'm in.

ProductInfo.Features:
Built-in DVD Player
Built in Speakers
Full Function Remote Control
Built in Dual Tuners
ProductInfo.Name: Supersonic SC-2412 24-Inch 60Hz LED-Lit TV
